titleStmt.title: The Whig rampant, or, Exaltation being a pleasant new song of 82, to a new tune of, Hey boys, up go we.
titleStmt.author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to F. Quarles. Cf. Wing.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
